Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix Suns have lost three games in a row.
Indiana Pacers are 8-6 on their home court.
Indiana Pacers are 8-7 against opponents over.500.
Phoenix Suns have gone 5-9 away from home.
Phoenix Suns are 4-2 in one-possession games.
Pacers make 48.8% of their shots from the field, which is 2.0 percentage points higher than the Suns have allowed to their opponents (46.8%).
Pacers average 14.3 made 3-pointers per game, 0.9 more makes per game than the Suns give up.
Pascal Siakam is averaging 19.8 points, 7.3 rebounds and 3.4 assists for the Pacers.
Kevin Durant is averaging 27.7 points, 6.5 rebounds and 3.8 assists for the Suns.
